title: Mediterranean chickpea pie
ingredients: ['2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '2 onions, chopped', '2 celery sticks, chopped', '1 red pepper, seeded and diced', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '2 courgettes, sliced', '2 cans chickpeas, about 410 g each, drained and rinsed', '2 cans chopped tomatoes, about 400 g each', '2 tbsp sun-dried tomato paste', '150 ml (5 fl oz) red wine', '2 tsp dried Italian herb seasoning', 'salt and pepper', 'Parmesan and tomato mash', '1 kg (2¼ lb) potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks', '4 tbsp semi-skimmed milk', '1 egg', '50 g (¾ oz) Parmesan cheese, freshly grated', '50 g (¾ oz) sun-dried tomatoes in oil, drained and finely chopped', '3 tbsp chopped fresh basil']
